alert.note: Alert for Modoc County Except for the Surprise Valley; Siskiyou County from the Cascade Mountains East and South to Mt Shasta; Western Klamath National Forest (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued July 21 at 2:34PM PDT until July 21 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...Gusty Winds with Very Low Humidity Today and Thursday... .Gusty afternoon and evening westerly winds combined with very dry relative humidity and dry vegetation will result in critical fire weather conditions in portions of Jackson, Siskiyou, Modoc, Lake, and Klamath counties this afternoon. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM PDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WIND WITH LOW RH FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 280... 284...285 AND 624... * Impacts: Gusty wind with low relative humidity and critically dry vegetation will greatly increase the spread potential of any new and existing fires. * Affected area: In Northern CA Fire Zones...280...284...285. In South Central OR Fire Zone....624. * Wind: Southwest 10 to 15 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * Humidity: 7 - 15 percent. * View the hazard area in detail at: https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/mfr/HAZARD

area.areaDesc: Modoc County Except for the Surprise Valley; Siskiyou County from the Cascade Mountains East and South to Mt Shasta; Western Klamath National Forest
